item.name: Add Payment Details
item.description: adding a new payment method (e.g Card) as default over existing payment method (e.g. bank) which was set default earlier overrides old choice and sets new method as default.

request.description: starting a service of same token type without ending the previous one is forbidden, but starting multiple services of different types alllowed.

item.name: Charge Bills

response.name: manual charge selected users bank Copy

item.description: for ongoing services current duration is calculated for billing and to keep track of only unpaid durations "lastPaidAt" flag is used.
